'''18w08a''' is the twenty-first [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on February 21, 2018<ref>{{snap|18w08a|February 21, 2018}}</ref>, which modified [[ocean]] generation and split the ocean into several different [[biome]]s.

== Additions ==
=== World generation ===
'''{{EnvLink|Underwater cave|Underwater caves}} and {{EnvLink|Underwater ravine|Underwater ravines}}'''
*[[Magma block]]s spawn at the bottom of ocean canyons at lava levels, creating downward [[bubble column]]s.

'''[[Biome]]s'''
*{{BiomeLink|Warm Ocean}}
*{{BiomeLink|Lukewarm Ocean}}
*{{BiomeLink|Cold Ocean}}
*{{BiomeLink|Deep Warm Ocean}}
*{{BiomeLink|Deep Lukewarm Ocean}}
*{{BiomeLink|Deep Cold Ocean}}
*{{BiomeLink|Deep Frozen Ocean}}
*{{BiomeLink|Frozen Ocean}}

=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|locate}}'''
*Added a clickable teleport link to the {{cmd|locate}} command output.

=== General ===
*Added a new sound effect for [[squid]] shooting ink.
<!-- The sound effect for bubble columns was present in prior snapshots; do not add it -->

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
[[File:Seagrass JE1 BE2.gif|width=32x32]] '''[[Seagrass]]'''
*The inventory item no longer has an animated texture.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=18w08a|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|94487|Ravines don't naturally cut through sand, sandstone, or terracotta upon generation, but other cave types do.
|122000|Items get deleted when the inventory is overflowed by using the recipe book to return items from a crafting table.
|;dev
|125124|Crash generating mansion (Exception generating new chunk "Not yet implemented")
|124299|{{cmd|give}} command: Items on ground for a long time not able to pick up.
|124948|{{cmd|enchant}} can be used by non-ops.
}}</onlyinclude>
